name: ScotchBlue™ Original Painter's Tape 2090-48NC, 1.88 in x 60 yd (48mm x 54,8m)
descriptionOriginalLanguage:
Mfr description03683 2090-48N SCOTCHBLUE PAINTERS TAPE
For industrial/occupational use only. Not for consumer sale or use.Designed for use on multiple surfaces such as smooth or lightly textured walls, trim, baseboards, tile and glass14-day clean removal leaves behind no damage or sticky residueMedium adhesiveUV and sunlight resistantSize: 1.88 in. x 60 yd.Pack Size: 1 Roll/PackTape Application Tips: For great paint results make sure the surface is clean, dry and dust-free so that the tape sticks properly. Next, apply the tape onto the surface while pressing down firmly as you go. And lastly, let the tape set for about 30 to 60 minutes before painting.Tape Removal Tips: Wait until the paint is dry to the touch before removing the tape. Lift the tape up by slowly pulling it back on itself, then removing at a 45-degree angle.
descriptionEnglish: Mfr description: 03683 2090-48N SCOTCHBLUE PAINTERS TAPE. For industrial/occupational use only. Designed for use on multiple surfaces (walls, trim, baseboards, tile, glass). 14-day clean removal leaves no damage or sticky residue. Medium adhesive. UV and sunlight resistant. Size: 1.88 in x 60 yd. Pack: 1 Roll/Pack. Application tips: ensure surface is clean, dry and dust-free; press tape firmly; let tape set 30–60 minutes before painting. Removal tips: wait until paint is dry to the touch; pull tape back on itself at a 45° angle.
_check: Some spec values inconsistent (Width 4.66 vs 1.88in); weight taken from specs may be approximate.

name: 3M 64763 High Performance Green Masking Tape 401+, 48 mm x 55 m 6.7 mil, 12 per case Bulk
descriptionOriginalLanguage:
3M™ High Performance Green Masking Tape 401+, 48 mm x 55 m 6.7 mil, 12 per case Bulk
Mfr description64763 GREEN MASKING 401+/233+ 48MM X 55M
For industrial/occupational use only. Not for consumer sale or use.Industrial masking tape that delivers sharp, clean paint lines and is ideal for high-temperature paint baking, fascia painting and powder coating applicationsRemoves cleanly in one piece with no adhesive residueRemains in place around corners, over contours and irregular surfacesResists paint bleed-through to help create sharp paint linesGreen backing improves visibility and accuracy during paint maskingWithstands surface temperatures up to 250°F/121°C for 30 minutes in paint bake operations
descriptionEnglish: 3M High Performance Green Masking Tape 401+, 48 mm x 55 m, 6.7 mil, 12 per case. Industrial masking tape that delivers sharp, clean paint lines and is ideal for high-temperature paint baking, fascia painting and powder coating. Removes cleanly with no adhesive residue, remains in place around corners and contours, resists paint bleed-through, and has a green backing for improved visibility. Withstands surface temperatures up to 250°F (121°C) for 30 minutes.

name: Tartan™ Box Sealing Tape 369, Clear, 48 mm x 100 m, 36/Case
descriptionOriginalLanguage:
Mfr description61553 TARTAN BOX SEALING TAPE 369
For industrial/occupational use only. Not for consumer sale or use. General purpose packaging tape for light-duty applications on a wide range of materials High edge tear and split resistance ideal for general purpose applications Polypropylene backing with synthetic rubber adhesive delivers conformability under stress Easy unwind and smooth dispensing works well on high-speed automated packaging lines Resists abrasion, moisture, chemicals and scuffing for long-lasting performance Excellent adhesion to recycled liner paper and fiberboard
descriptionEnglish:
Mfr description 61553 TARTAN BOX SEALING TAPE 369
For industrial/occupational use only. Not for consumer sale or use. General purpose packaging tape for light-duty applications on a wide range of materials. High edge tear and split resistance ideal for general purpose applications. Polypropylene backing with synthetic rubber adhesive delivers conformability under stress. Easy unwind and smooth dispensing works well on high-speed automated packaging lines. Resists abrasion, moisture, chemicals and scuffing for long-lasting performance. Excellent adhesion to recycled liner paper and fiberboard.

name: 3M 60895 Impact Stripping Tape 500, Green, 2 in x 10 yd, 36 mil
descriptionOriginalLanguage:
Mfr description60895 IMPACT STRIPPING TAPE 500 GREEN
For industrial/occupational use only. Not for consumer sale or use.
Green, durable backing protects against a variety of blasting media
Greater visibility during removal due to green color
Thinnest of the portfolio yet provides outstanding conformability
Acrylic adhesive provides reliable bond to various surfaces
Adhesive helps ensure clean, one-piece removal without residue
Easy release paper liner makes for efficient die-cutting
descriptionEnglish:
Manufacturer description: 60895 IMPACT STRIPPING TAPE 500 GREEN.
For industrial/occupational use only. Not for consumer sale or use.
Features: Green durable backing; greater visibility during removal; very thin with outstanding conformability; acrylic adhesive for reliable bond; clean one-piece removal without residue; easy-release paper liner for die-cutting.
